definition: To shape or form something, often used in the context of creating or designing something with a specific purpose or aesthetic. It is commonly employed when referring to the act of crafting or molding objects, ideas, or concepts into a desired structure or appearance.

examples.german: Ich möchte mein Zimmer neu gestalten.
examples.english: I want to redecorate my room.

examples.german: Sie gestaltet ihre Arbeit immer sehr kreativ.
examples.english: She always approaches her work very creatively.

examples.german: Die Designerin gestaltet ein neues Logo für die Firma.
examples.english: The designer is creating a new logo for the company.

examples.german: Er gestaltet seine Freizeit gerne mit Sportaktivitäten.
examples.english: He enjoys spending his free time engaging in sports activities.

examples.german: Die Künstlerin gestaltet eine Skulptur aus Ton.
examples.english: The artist is sculpting a sculpture out of clay.
